pageContext.claim: “That was not a good -- and I would say her [Hillary Clinton's] last statement about women -- they have to get approval from their husbands, their sons, and their male bosses to vote for Trump. That was not a good statement. Not good.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump jumbled Clinton's comment, made in India, that women voted for Trump because the men in their lives wanted them to -- the opposite of needing to get approval.
